Package com.thoughtworks.xstream.annotations

These classes are included here so that there is no runtime dependency on XStream.

See:
          Description

Annotation Types Summary
XStreamAlias Annotation used to define an XStream class or field value.
XStreamAsAttribute Defines that a field should be serialized as an attribute.
XStreamImplicit An annotation for marking a field as an implicit collection.
XStreamOmitField Declares a field to be omitted.
 

Package com.thoughtworks.xstream.annotations Description

These classes are included here so that there is no runtime dependency on XStream. If these were not included, XStream would be required to load the ADL classes up.
